verses.name: Genesis 40:17
verses.text: And in the uppermost basket there was of all manner of bakemeats for Pharaoh; and the birds did eat them out of the basket upon my head.

verses.name: Genesis 40:18
verses.text: And Joseph answered and said, This is the interpretation thereof: The three baskets are three days:

verses.name: Genesis 40:19
verses.text: Yet within three days shall Pharaoh lift up thy head from off thee, and shall hang thee on a tree; and the birds shall eat thy flesh from off thee.
